Unique_IdentifierObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Unique_IdentifierObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Unique_IdentifierObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Payroll_Result_Request_References.description: Reference to an existing Payroll Result related to the Pre-Printed Payslip

Payroll_Result_Request_Criteria.description: Start Date - Must be provided along with End Date to determine the date range to retrieve Payroll Results.
End Date - Must be provided along with Start Date to determine the date range to retrieve Payroll Results.

Period_Date_IndicatorObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Payroll_Result_Request_Criteria.description: Period Selection Date Reference.  Indicates whether to use Period Start Date, Period End Date, or Payment Date within the Start Date and End Date.

Pay_Calculations_Selected.description: Earning Reference.  List of Earnings to retrieve Payroll Results for.  When specifying an Earning Code for tenanted data, Earning_Code needs to be used.  When specifying an Earning Code for Workday Owned data, Workday_Earning_Code needs to be used.

Pay_Calculations_Selected.description: Deduction Reference.  List of Deductions to retrieve Payroll Results for.  When specifying a Deduction Code for tenanted data, Deduction_Code needs to be used.  When specifying a Deduction Code for Workday Owned data, Workday_Deduction_Code needs to be used.

Pay_Calculations_Selected.description: Pay Accumulation Code specified for calculating Payroll Balance for the specified Period.  When specifying a Pay Accumulation Code for tenanted data, Pay_Accumulation_Code needs to be used.  When specifying a Pay Accumulation Code for Workday Owned data, Workday_Pay_Accumulation_Code needs to be used.

Payroll_Result_Request_Criteria.description: Pay Calculation Criteria.  List of Payroll Calculations (Earnings, Deductions, and Pay Accumulations) to retrieve Payroll Results for.

validation.validation: End Date must be equal to or greater than the Start Date.
validation.description: End Date must be equal to or greater than the Start Date.

validation.validation: No Payroll Periods were found within the Start Date and End Date range, based on the Period Selection Date rule.
validation.description: At least one Payroll Period must be contained within the Start Date and End Date range, based on the Period Selection Date rule.

validation.validation: The Period Date Indicator entered is owned by Workday and is not available for use in this context.

Response_Filter.description: Indicates the date when application data, such as benefits and compensation, become effective (Also referred to as the Effective Moment). If you don't specify a date, this date defaults to today.{+4}
The date and time the data was entered into the system. (This field is also referred to as the Entry Moment). If the date isn't specified, the default date is the current date and time.

The numbered page of data Workday returns in the response. The default page is the first page(Page = 1). For responses that contain more than one page of data, use this parameter to retrieve the additional pages of data. For example, set Page = 2 to retrieve the second page of data.Note: If you set the page parameter, you must also specify the "As_Of_Entry_Date" to ensure that the result set remains the same between your requests.
Sets the number of objects to return within each response page. Set a value between 1 and 999. The default value is 100.

description: Parameters that let you filter the data returned in the response. You can filter returned data by dates and page attributes.

Payroll_Result_Response_Group.description: Include Name Data - If True (1), Name Data  will be included in the response.
Include National ID Data - If True (1), National ID Data will be included in the response.
Include Related Calculation Result Data - If True (1), Related Calculation Result Data will be included in the response.
Include Withholding Order Data - If True (1), Withholding Order Data will be included in the response.
Include Payroll WorktagData - If True (1), Payroll WorktagData will be included in the response.
Include QTD Data - If True (1), Quarter-To-Date data will be included in the response.
Include YTD Data - If True (1), Year -To- Date data will be included in the response.
